name: A Walk in the Country
description:
i made this a while ago when twine 2 first went into beta as a sort of test project to see how the new app worked... i wanted to put it up here on my itch page so i decided to clean it up a little and add some pictures. i also added a new secret in there somewhere.

the css implementation is a little hacky as adding css to specific passage tags isn't implemented in twine 2 yet, so i might go back and change that at some point
